item.name: OMSA: Chassis Express Service Code Name
item.description: This attribute defines the chassis express service code of the system.

item.name: OMSA: Chassis Manufacturer Name
item.description: Defines the system manufacturer for this chassis.

item.name: OMSA: Chassis Model Name
item.description: Defines the system model type for this chassis.

item.name: OMSA: Chassis Service TagName
item.description: Defines the service tag name for this chassis.

item.name: SNMP on port 161 in LISTEN state
OMSA: Event Log Status
item.description: Defines the overall status of this chassis (ESM) event log.

item.name: OMSA: Processor Status
item.description: Defines the combined status of all processor devices of this chassis.

item.name: OMSA: Temperature Status
item.description: Defines the status of all temperature probes in this chassis. The result is returned as a combined status value. The value has the same definition type as DellStatus.

discovery_rule.name: OMSA: ArrayDisk discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of array disks using the DiskSerialNo. information.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk bus type [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the bus type of the array disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk capacity [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the capacity of the array disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk channel connection controller number [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the channel connection controller number of the array disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk Dell certified [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the the array disk is certified by Dell.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk enclosure connection controller number [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the enclosure connection controller number of the array disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk media type [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the media type of the array disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk name [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the array disk name

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk productID [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the productID of the array disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk serial number[{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the serialNo. of the array disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk smart alert [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies a SMART alert for this array disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk spare state [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies if the array disk is a spare disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk state [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the current state of the array disk.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Array Disk vendor [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the vendor of the array disk

trigger_prototype.name: OMSA: Array disk {ITEM.LASTVALUE4} on ctrl-{ITEM.LASTVALUE5} [SN:{ITEM.LASTVALUE3}] is in {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} state
trigger_prototype.description: Array disk ({#SNMPVALUE}) in Replacing or Rebuid state

trigger_prototype.name: OMSA: Array disk {ITEM.LASTVALUE4} on ctrl-{ITEM.LASTVALUE5} [SN:{ITEM.LASTVALUE3}] is in {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} state
trigger_prototype.description: Array disk ({#SNMPVALUE}) in Replacing or Rebuid state

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskState[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>3 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskState[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskSerialNo[{#SNMPVALUE}].strlen()}>-1 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskName[{#SNMPVALUE}].strlen()}>-1 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskChannelConnectionControllerNumber[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>-1 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskState[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>22 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskState[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>24
trigger_prototype.name: OMSA: Array disk {ITEM.LASTVALUE4} on ctrl-{ITEM.LASTVALUE5} [SN:{ITEM.LASTVALUE3}] is not Ready/Online - State: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskState[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>3 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskState[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskSerialNo[{#SNMPVALUE}].strlen()}>-1 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskName[{#SNMPVALUE}].strlen()}>-1 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskEnclosureConnectionControllerNumber[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>-1 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskState[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>22 and {Template-snmp-dell-openmanage:arrayDiskState[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>24
trigger_prototype.name: OMSA: Array disk {ITEM.LASTVALUE4} on ctrl-{ITEM.LASTVALUE5} [SN:{ITEM.LASTVALUE3}] is not Ready/Online - State: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}
OMSA: Predictive disk failure detected on {ITEM.LASTVALUE4} on ctrl-{ITEM.LASTVALUE5} [SN:{ITEM.LASTVALUE3}]
trigger_prototype.description: Predictive disk failure detected by SMART on {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger_prototype.name: OMSA: Predictive disk failure detected on {ITEM.LASTVALUE4} on ctrl-{ITEM.LASTVALUE5} [SN:{ITEM.LASTVALUE3}]
trigger_prototype.description: Predictive disk failure detected by SMART on {#SNMPVALUE}

discovery_rule.name: OMSA: CacheBattery discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discover cache batteries in the system

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Cache battery controller ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Controller to which this battery belongs

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Cache battery learn state ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Learn state activity of the battery

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Cache battery name ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Battery name

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Cache battery predicted capacity ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Battery's ability to be charged

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Cache battery roll-up status ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Severity of the battery state. This is the combined status of the battery and its components.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Cache battery state ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: State of the battery

trigger_prototype.name: OMSA: Battery charging fail [{ITEM.LASTVALUE3} on ctrl-{ITEM.LASTVALUE4}] - Replace battery
OMSA: Battery learning cycle fail [{ITEM.LASTVALUE3} on ctrl-{ITEM.LASTVALUE4}]
OMSA: Battery status: Failed [{ITEM.LASTVALUE3} on ctrl-{ITEM.LASTVALUE4}] - Replace battery

item_prototype.description: Chassis fan critical threshold

item_prototype.description: Chassis fan name

item_prototype.description: Chassis fan reading

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Chassis fan status ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Chassis fan status

OMSA: Chassis fan [{ITEM.VALUE3} / {ITEM.VALUE4} RPM] under critical threshold ({ITEM.VALUE2} RPM)

item_prototype.description: Power supply sensor state

item_prototype.description: Power supply status

item_prototype.description: Power supply type

OMSA: Power supply status: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} [PSU-{#SNMPVALUE} / {ITEM.LASTVALUE4}] - Predictive Failure
OMSA: Power supply status: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} [PSU-{#SNMPVALUE} / {ITEM.LASTVALUE5}] - AC lost or out-of-range

item_prototype.description: Enclosure firmware

item_prototype.description: Enclosure rollup status

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Memory Device failure mode ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Defines the failure mode of the memory device.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Memory Device location name ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Defines the location of the memory device.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Memory Device size ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Defines the size of the memory device.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Memory Device Status ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: Defines the status of the memory device.

trigger_prototype.name: OMSA: Memory Device status: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} - [{#SNMPVALUE} / {ITEM.LASTVALUE3}] ECC multibit fault encountered
OMSA: Memory Device status: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} - [{#SNMPVALUE} / {ITEM.LASTVALUE3}] ECC multibit fault encountered

discovery_rule.name: OMSA: VirtualDisk discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of virtual disks using the device name information.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Virtual Disk capacity [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the capacity of the virtual disk

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Virtual Disk Layout [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Indicates the virtual disk's RAID type.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Virtual Disk name[{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Indicates the virtual disk's name

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Virtual Disk Read Policy [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Indicates whether the controller's read cache are used when reading from a virtual disk.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Virtual Disk State [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Identifies the current state of this virtual disk.

item_prototype.name: OMSA: Virtual Disk Write Policy [{#SNMPVALUE}]
item_prototype.description: Indicates whether the controller's write cache are used when writing to a virtual disk.

trigger_prototype.name: OMSA: Virtual disk is not Ready/Online, State: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1} - [{ITEM.LASTVALUE3} - {ITEM.LASTVALUE4} / {ITEM.LASTVALUE5} ]

trigger.name: Hardware monitoring not available - SNMP on port 161 is not in LISTEN state
